title: Borderlands 3 Release Date and More Details - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.03.19
description:
Order your 23andMe Health + Ancestry Service kit at http://23andme.com/games

The first 500 people to sign up will receive a 2 month free trial. Go to https://skl.sh/kindafunnygamesdaily3 to start your trial now. 

Fran and Gary discuss Borderlands, Epic Games Store, Persona rumors, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:02:30 - Housekeeping
Saturday Meet ‘n’ Greet, you’re on the clock, New York! 3 p.m. at E’s Bar - Morningside Heights
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Tom Bock
Black Jack
James Davis
Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:05:38 - Borderlands 3 Release Date, New Trailer, Epic Store Exclusive By Tamoor Hussain (GameSpot)
00:14:33 - BORDERLANDS 3 SUPPORTS CROSS-PLATFORM CO-OP ACCORDING TO MICROSOFT STORE
00:21:11 - REPORT: Anthem Developers Cite Hardships as Problems By Jason Schrier (Kotaku)
00:45:11 -  LEAK: Persona 5 on Switch, Metroid Prime Trilogy By Matt Purslow (IGN)
00:52:30 -  Nintendo Announces 3 New Games for Switch Online in April By Nathan Anstadt (Game Informer)
00:52:20 - Out today
:: Best Friend Q. -  -
00:56:50 -  23&Me
00:59:23 -  Skillshare
Reader mail   -
01:00:40 - Should a game studio’s work environment reflect in a review score? - TwoHeadedGiant
01:03:00 - After reading Jason Schreier's article on the development of Anthem the only thing I could think of is what could we do as consumers? - Alex Russ (Zero Syndicate)
01:05:10 - Squad Up:GillyBrums ("Gil") PS4 - Br1ght-Shadow
01:06:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Andrea
